website_summaries.verdict: An underwater fishing camera with a huge portable screen, and amazing features make this a big time camera for the big time fish finder.
pros: The high-definition underwater camera works wonderfully and captures fish clearly in clear or murky water
The large nine-inch color monitor is comfortable to look at and the removable sun-visor does come in handy
There’s a high capacity battery that’s quickly rechargeable and the DVR functionality allows users to easily record underwater video onto a microSD card
cons: The camera design makes suspending the camera underwater while in a boat a bit tricky
In certain conditions, it may take time getting used to knowing what direction the camera is facing while submerged

customer_reviews.title: Get it!
customer_reviews.text: This camera has worked great this ice fishing season. Really clear picture. It has been much more reliable than my Helix 5 sonar has been, but that's a different story altogether..... Video is while my six year old goddaughter pulled her bait out of the water and put it back in just as the fish swam away, fun times! Haha! Northern pike like to attack the camera, but luckily the camera is pretty tough!
customer_reviews.author: joe palmquist

customer_reviews.title: Ready to use and fun to watch
customer_reviews.text: fun to see whats under the water surface, I just wish it could be mounted to something a bit easier. Still trying to figure it all out with depth and all. The picture in clear water is amazing, and the carrier is well thought out. No photo experience needed, its an open box and play product,..... I recommend to all.
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: Great Fishing Camera, very good service
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this camera for about a year and absolutely love it. Ice fishing is SOOO much more amusing when you can watch the fish approaching your lures. We usually drill 4 holes, then put the camera in one of the ends holes, pointed at the other three. Once we get all three lines into view, the show begins. Surprisingly good picture quality, even at depth. My camera recently died, and I emailed the company. Within 8 hours they had responded and sent me a new camera. I know electronics will go bad sometimes, but knowing the company will actually respond and help me resolve the issue is important when considering a purchase. Very impressed so far.
customer_reviews.author: BuddyGuy

customer_reviews.title: For the money I think this is a good camera.
customer_reviews.text: I use this camera for ice fishing. I also have a Marcum camera. The picture on the eyoyo camera is not as good as the Marcum. Other than that I think the eyoyo is as good if not better than the Marcum camera. In semi murky water you can see about 4 or 5 feet. Same as the Marcum but the Marcum has a sharper image.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Remarkable !  Very pleased... Clearer than I believed possible..
customer_reviews.text: We are really pleased with this underwater camera.. we tested it and could see details in 20 feet of salt water with no problem. It will be used for many different applications.. we are delighted and hope it will last. We wiped the cable down to remove the salt water with fresh water.. as we know how corrosive it can be. Would definitely recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: walter w.

customer_reviews.title: No Good
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this camera based on the on-line reviews. Battery was no-good out of the box, also its hard fixing the brightness, color and contrast. Started to fish at 7am and was looking at a black wall. 9am got black and white no color unless the camera was out of the water. By 2pm the black wall was back. I'm returning this unit and paying more for something that will work!
customer_reviews.author: TH

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Color. Lots of fun.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for a Christmas gift for my 16 year old son. We have had a blast, using it multiple times this winter. Battery life has never failed us while we are on our adventures. Lots of fun looking at different Species of fish. Very easy to use, love that its all in one compact case. Only complaint, my son can now see when I’m not setting my hook correctly, and the fish gets away!!! Mom struggles 😉
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: great customer service
customer_reviews.text: Bought this camera for ice fishing. Haven't had a chance to use it yet but I've had a couple questions in customer service is absolutely 100% A+ to deal with! They were very prompt and getting back to me and very adamant about making sure I was satisfied could not ask for better customer service. The picture quality is good and everything seems to work very well but like I said I have not used it in the water yet that is the only reason for not giving a 5-star review.
customer_reviews.author: CAK

customer_reviews.title: So awesome..
customer_reviews.text: Got to use this for the first time. The water was very dark and murky under the ice, but this camera definitely did the job. I think the lights on it, brought in more fish. Rigged it with the clips to work horizontally. The only way to twist it the way you want is by letting it sit right on the lake floor.. then twist the cord the direction you want it. Did all I expected it to do.. Kids loved it too. Made fishing with them way more fun..
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very sharp video both in fresh and salt water
customer_reviews.text: First test with my new underwater video system, unfortunately the test was cut short because I was being attacked by a swarm of crabs that got a hold of the cable and I was afraid they would damage it. I'll have to revise the camera and cable for more protection. I see a lot of potential for not only videos but also for my underwater search and recovery projects.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry Sorensen

customer_reviews.title: Returned 2, 1 more chance.
customer_reviews.text: Returned 2, first had water mark on screen thought it may have been screen protector, pulled green and clear tabs to remove and found out no screen protector installed. The 2nd had bad pixels. Will try one more time as my friends use this brand with no issues. The first may have got wet in package.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Sherman

customer_reviews.title: Super easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to set up use. I dropped a very expensive window cover for my yacht. Used the camera to locate it so I could scoop it out Quality of video is amazing
customer_reviews.author: Allan

customer_reviews.title: Nice for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Works well it has a nice picture. I had a chance to use it next to my friends $900 aqua-view and clarity was very close. I wish they was an easier way to change the way the camera sits. Also the cable is very thin. The price is great for what you get.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: This fishcam is so cool. It works great. Long battery life and records in increments to easily find image you seek. This is my must have now when I go fishing.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great little unit with excellent battery life.
customer_reviews.text: Didn't like how they want you to put so much strain on the cable coming out of the camera by fixing the wire to the eyeloops with the provided white rings. I taped some fishing line with a swivel to the cable that I can attach to each of the eyeloops to get the different camera angles without the strain on the cable.
customer_reviews.author: shawn abeyta

customer_reviews.title: I like the product for the money its a great buy
customer_reviews.text: I like the product for the money its a great buy,, the manual is lacking and not clear how to delete recorded vids and pictures from the DVR
customer_reviews.author: Jerrell

customer_reviews.title: We love it! BATtERY LASTS In the coldest of weather
customer_reviews.text: CRISP CLEAR PICTURE! We love it! BATtERY LASTS In the coldest of weather. Screen is difficult to see in direct sunlight, so you'll want shade while filming.
customer_reviews.author: Becky L.

customer_reviews.title: color view
customer_reviews.text: about 95% black and white, hardly any color, not happy,and in the water it looks like a million bubbles on the screan, save your money
customer_reviews.author: frank i.

customer_reviews.title: This product Meets my business requirements for underwater recovery
customer_reviews.text: Good packaging, the right size to operate off boats or on docks. The Camera is the top of the line. Looking forward to using this product in the field to conduct underwater surveys and recovery.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice product
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my grandson. He loves it. Easy to use with a decent picture. Directions could have a little more detail. Camera is front heavy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Where sunshade?
customer_reviews.text: Everything look good but just one thing i not see no sunshade. I need it the sunshade please thank
customer_reviews.author: Aaron S.

customer_reviews.title: I tested it in my 125 gallon aquarium and was ...
customer_reviews.text: I tested it in my 125 gallon aquarium and was impressed;. Haven't had it out on the boat yet.
customer_reviews.author: Harold G. Branch

customer_reviews.title: Great value!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this camera for ice fishing this winter. Tried out out at local marina after battery charged. The screen quality is great! Exceeds my expectations for an underwater camera! Fast shipping & excellent customer service!
customer_reviews.author: mistiera21

customer_reviews.title: Quality is very good
customer_reviews.text: I like it . Very nice and clear images. Great battery life.
customer_reviews.author: frank rivera

customer_reviews.title: Missing parts
customer_reviews.text: Missing remote control and micro s d cards in shipment. Also need support on operational instructions. Website (supporteyoyousa) doesn’t provide this
customer_reviews.author: Where are the fish

customer_reviews.title: clarity
customer_reviews.text: We really enjoyed the fish finder. It was very clear and very easy to use. The case and the adapters are very compact and easy to carry on to the ice, as we went ice fishing. I would recommend this item to fisher men or women.
customer_reviews.author: kathy strominski

customer_reviews.title: Eyoyo 9inch
customer_reviews.text: Haven’t got to use it yet, charged the battery and camera works great. However the micro s d card is missing I would love to have one to record with. The picture is real clear.
customer_reviews.author: Harold Kemper

customer_reviews.title: wow
customer_reviews.text: This product works great, I am veryhappy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Olson

customer_reviews.title: Prefixed
customer_reviews.text: I try it out, and it blew me away. It's prefix, I can show my 2 year old granddaughter fish under water and she loved it. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: George Kahan

customer_reviews.title: Great quality for the value!!!
customer_reviews.text: I liked the quality of the product and the value. I think this will last me a long time and I will have years of fun with this.
customer_reviews.author: Fishingluv

customer_reviews.title: Love my camera
customer_reviews.text: Works great, battery life lasts awhile, sure helped me catching lakers
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Seems to be an okay product won't know more till I try it out
customer_reviews.text: Use for fishing no ice yet to try it out
customer_reviews.author: mary

customer_reviews.title: Great camera....bad documentation
customer_reviews.text: We are having a great time ice fishing with this camera, however the instructions that come with it are horrible. We checked online and there is no documentation
customer_reviews.author: Judi Lavallee

customer_reviews.title: the equipment is great. Big things come in small packages
customer_reviews.text: So user friendly. The picture is sharp, the equipment is great. Big things come in small packages! Buy it, use it, enjoy all the wonders you never knew were below the water. We really do like it.
customer_reviews.author: lBJean

customer_reviews.title: I am satisfied with the total product
customer_reviews.text: The reason I gave it a 4-star is because due to the weather not able to use it for ice fishing as of writing this review. I am satisfied with the total product. The case very sturdy, separate compartments for each item,the screen resolution is very clear. I tried the night vision in a dark room and I am very satisfied with the results and the adjustment of the lights is a plus. Wire attached to the camera seems to be a little light but hopefully it'll hold up for several years.All in All it's a well-made product.
customer_reviews.author: John Giovan

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Camera looks well made and it does come with the TF card, its in the slot in the monitor!
customer_reviews.author: Rich Flohrs

product_meta.title: Eyoyo Portable 9 inch LCD Monitor Fish Finder HD 1000TVL Fishing Camera Waterproof Underwater DVR Video Cam 30m Cable 12pcs IR Infrared LED for Ice,Lake and Boat Fishing
feature_bullets: ★【9" LARGER COLOR MONITOR】: The Image display more realistic and delicate, 9 inch TFT color monitor with removable sun-visor ideal for bright environments

★【1000TVL CAMERA with 12pcs INFRARED LEDS】: Specially manufactured 1000TVL program chip and 12pcs IR LED Lights, fishes will be seen more clearly in the dark environment. Please note: the image will turn to black and white if you open the infrared light.
★【DVR RECORDING FUNCTION】: 8GB TF card included, you can record the underwater landscapes as your want.
★【SPECIAL FISH SHAPE AND SILVER COLOR DESIGN】: This unique design will not disturb the fish, it can Lure the fish close to.
★【6-8H WORKING TIME】: 4500mAh high capacity rechargeable battery cell box included, It can also be used for LED Lights control.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.1 out of 5 stars80 ratings4.1 out of 5 stars
